thread.title: IMPORTANT: You Can Listen to Justin Bieber's Newest Single "Sorry" Right Now
thread.title_full: IMPORTANT: You Can Listen to Justin Bieber's Newest Single "Sorry" Right Now

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: IMPORTANT: You Can Listen to Justin Bieber's Newest Single "Sorry" Right Now
text:
After teasing the world for a week, Justin Bieber went and dropped the song ​and ​dance video for "Sorry" a day early. He himself never makes an appearance in the video, but the whole thing — featuring only beautiful women gyrating on and around each other — is a party regardless.
Maybe that's because it's set to a trippy, sultry Skrillex beat? Maybe it's because Justin is singing about how badly he wants your body? Not only that, he's begging for a second chance and wants to "redeem [him]self tonight." The song is reminiscent of "Boyfriend" in that Justin sounds like the sexiest preteen on the planet. Do you remember how you felt when you first saw this? Yeah, not sorry.
GIF Share Tweet Pin E-mail Watch the video above. If I don't hear from ü after, I won't ask where are you now, I'll assume you are off exploring your new inner Belieber, your purpose. Do you see what I did there? Not sorry, never sorry.
Follow Tess on Twitter . ​
